amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 119-255 to modify federal statutes 50 USC 797 and 18 USC 1382.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases penalities for entering a military installation or violates national defense area security regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 205 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Wilson (SC).
